Ingredients.1: 6 medium jalapeno peppers, halved and seeded

Ingredients.3: 1 ounce shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste

Ingredients.4: 3 slices skin-on wild salmon, cut into 4 pieces

Ingredients.5: 6 slices bacon, cut in half lengthwise

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 390 degrees F (199 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions.

Directions.2: Fill each jalapeno half with some cream cheese and Cheddar cheese. Place 1/2 a slice of salami on top of each pepper, wrap with a piece of bacon, and secure with a toothpick, if necessary.

Directions.3: Layer jalapeno poppers inside of the preheated air fryer and cook until bacon is browned and cheese is melted, 10 to 12 minutes.
